thread.title: Dale Jr., McMurray unveil 'Halo 5: Guardians' paint schemes
thread.title_full: Dale Jr., McMurray unveil 'Halo 5: Guardians' paint schemes

title: Dale Jr., McMurray unveil 'Halo 5: Guardians' paint schemes
text:
FOX Sports Josh Richter - Shake and Bake Crew Share This Story Updated Oct 8, 2015 at 4:38p ET 
Dale Earnhardt Jr . and Jamie McMurray sent fans on a treasure hunt. 
Using #HUNTthe88 and #HUNTthe1 on Twitter, fans have to follow a series of clues to help reveal the "Halo 5: Guardians" paint schemes that Earnhardt and McMurray will be running at Kansas Speedway next weekend. #HUNTthe88 is on! I tagged where you need to go next for a look at my Halo 5 paint scheme for the Kansas race… pic.twitter.com/M0Oje1yvcS — Dale Earnhardt Jr. (@DaleJr) October 8, 2015 Your mission is in full swing! Master Chief wouldn't want you to fall behind on the hunt! #HUNTthe88 pic.twitter.com/UFhiVLbVKT — Hendrick Motorsports (@TeamHendrick) October 8, 2015 We’re serving as a terminal for today’s hunt… The battle continues! #HUNTthe1 #HUNTthe88 pic.twitter.com/EHNJdM1ohn
